timeline.message:
hide AtomicReference form inheritors

clean up state utilities

Signed-off-by: Ratan Rai Sur <ratan.r.sur@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure why we should remove isSucceeded but we should keep isFailed. maybe I missed something
timeline.author: matkt

replies.bodyText: I removed the method entirely and here because this was the only place it was used and if the previous two assertions, isDone and isFailed are true, isSucceeded can never be true.
replies.author: RatanRSur

timeline.bodyText:
isDone instead of isCancelled?  Can we re-execute something that completed normally?  isDone catches any termination.
Also, perhaps move the started before the cancelled/done check?
timeline.author: shemnon

replies.bodyText: You're right, I think it should be isDone.
replies.author: RatanRSur

timeline.message:
isComplete -> isDone

Signed-off-by: Ratan Rai Sur <ratan.r.sur@gmail.com>
